mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN_USER_TABLE (USER_ID, USER_SE_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_PW, USER_ROLE, PHONE_NUMBER, EMAIL_ADDRESS, USER_POSITION, GRADE, CLASS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{uniqId}, #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{userRole}, #{phoneNumber}, #{userEmail}, #{userSpaceOrgInfo}, #{gradeNm}, #{classNm}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as uniqId, USER_SE_CODE as id, USER_NAME as name, USER_PW as password, USER_ROLE as userRole, PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber, EMAIL_ADDRESS as userEmail, USER_POSITION as userSpaceOrgInfo, GRADE as gradeNm, CLASS as classNm, CREATED_AT as createAt, UPDATED_AT as updateAt FROM ADMIN_USER_TABLE WHERE USER_ID = #{uniqId}

SELECT USER_ID as uniqId, USER_SE_CODE as id, USER_NAME as name, USER_PW as password, USER_ROLE as userRole, PHONE_NUMBER as phoneNumber, EMAIL_ADDRESS as userEmail, USER_POSITION as userSpaceOrgInfo, GRADE as gradeNm, CLASS as classNm, CREATED_AT as createAt, UPDATED_AT as updateAt FROM ADMIN_USER_TABLE WHERE USER_ROLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userRole}, '%')
and CAST(CREATE_AT as DATE) >= CAST(#{startDate} as DATE)
and CAST(CREATE_AT as DATE) <= CAST(#{endDate} as DATE)
AND USER_SE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{id}, '%') AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uniqId}, '%') AND USER_POSITION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userSpaceOrgInfo}, '%') AND USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND EMAIL_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userEmail}, '%') ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC limit #{limit} offset #{firstIndex}
select count(*) from ADMIN_USER_TABLE WHERE USER_ROLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userRole}, '%')
select CASE WHEN count(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END as userExists from ADMIN_USER_TABLE where USER_ID = #{uniqId}
